- Worked directly with Project Manager and Key Decision Makers from Purdue Pharma to work out the strategy, prototype and concepts for internal intelligence app. - Worked with Project Managers in small teams to deliver user flow diagrams, interactive prototypes and detailed wireframes.- Sketched, Created User Flow Diagrams and Prototyped mobile app for Bloomingdales.com- Created strategy and clickthrough UI Design and Prototype for Cruise Company.Tools: UX Pin, Balsamiq, LucidChart, InDesign, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator

summary: I have been working in the Internet Advertising and Online Marketing industry ever since I graduated from college in 2000. I have acquired a vast amount of knowledge and real world experience. I have worked as a site engineer, web designer, site developer, graphic designer, flash animator, CSS coder, and now UX/UI Designer.Design tools:- Adobe Suite: Photoshop / Illustrator- UX Pin, Balsamiq, Lucid Chart, Axure- Sublime Coding Languages:CSS3, XML, HTML 5, JQuery, JavaScript, AS3, PHP, MySQL, Front End and Database integration, User Interface Layouts.My experience allowed me to understand and analyze the multiple layers of work involved in creating successful marketing campaigns, online web presence, interactive banners, email campaigns, flash presentations, and e-commerce applications. My experience in the client-service end of the web design business has ingrained in me the importance of establishing solid relationships built on excellent service. I take pride in my reputation as a creative problem solver and out-of-the-box thinker.Highlights of my qualifications include:- Over 12 years professional creative experience in web based applications and graphic design. - Intuitive worker able to complete projects reliably with minimal direction. - Strategic thinker and planner, skilled in the design and execution of innovative website, graphic and print materials. - Adaptable to diverse situations and projects while maintaining focus under tight deadlines. - Outstanding leadership abilities; able to coordinate and direct all phases of project-based efforts while managing, motivating and leading project teams with a commitment to deadlines. - Gifted communicator, able to form strong relationships with colleagues and clients at all levels
